entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
